definitions: To defeat by a small margin.
To hit with a shot, especially in a game or battle.
To break through the shell of an egg (of a chick).
To make a short, sharp sound, like a small bird.
examples: The chick began to pip inside the egg.
He managed to pip his rival at the finish line.
The radar will pip when it detects movement.
The sniper tried to pip the target.
